summary: The Security Council, recalling previous resolutions on Lebanon, expresses concern at escalating hostilities in Lebanon and Israel since 12 July 2006. Noting the Secretary-General's report on UNIFIL, it urges parties to respect UNIFIL's safety and allows it to resupply, conduct search and rescue operations, and take necessary measures. The mandate of UNIFIL is extended until 31 August 2006. The Council remains actively seized of the matter.
